verses.verse: Again,<WH8671> in the ninth year,<WH8141> in the tenth<WH6224> month,<WH2320> in the tenth<WH6218> day of the month,<WH2320> the word<WH1697> of Yahweh<WH3068> came to me,<WH559> saying,

Son<WH1121> of man,<WH120> write<WH3789> the name<WH8034> of the day,<WH3117> even of this same<WH6106> day:<WH3117> the king<WH4428> of Babylon<WH894> drew<WH5564> close to Jerusalem<WH3389> this same<WH6106> day.<WH3117>

Utter<WH4911> a parable<WH4912> to the rebellious<WH4805> house,<WH1004> and tell<WH559> them,<WH559> Thus says the Lord<WH136> Yahweh,<WH3069> Set on<WH8239> the caldron,<WH5518> set it on,<WH8239> and also pour<WH3332> water into it:<WH4325>
gather<WH622> its pieces<WH5409> into it,<WH2896> even every good piece,<WH5409> the thigh,<WH3409> and the shoulder;<WH3802> fill<WH4390> it with the choice<WH4005> bones.<WH6106>

Take<WH3947> the choice<WH4005> of the flock,<WH6629> and also a pile of wood<WH1754> for the bones<WH6106> under the caldron;<WH7570> make it boil well;<WH7571> yes,<WH6106> let its bones be boiled<WH1310> in its midst.<WH8432>

Therefore thus says<WH559> the Lord<WH136> Yahweh:<WH136> Woe<WH188> to the bloody<WH1818> city,<WH5892> to the caldron<WH5518> whose rust<WH2457> is therein,<WH2457> and whose rust is not gone out<WH3318> of it!<WH3318> take out of it piece<WH5409> after piece;<WH5409> No lot<WH1486> is fallen on it.<WH5307>
For her blood<WH1818> is in the midst<WH8432> of her;<WH7760> she set it on the bare<WH6706> rock;<WH5553> she didn't<WH8210> pour it on the ground,<WH776> to cover<WH3680> it with dust.<WH6083>
That it may cause wrath<WH2534> to come up<WH5927> to take<WH5358> vengeance,<WH5359> I have set<WH5414> her blood<WH1818> on the bare<WH6706> rock,<WH5553> that it should not be covered.<WH3680>
Therefore thus says<WH559> the Lord<WH136> Yahweh:<WH136> Woe<WH188> to the bloody<WH1818> city!<WH5892> I also will make the pile<WH4071> great.<WH1431>
Heap<WH7235> on the wood,<WH6086> make<WH1814> the fire<WH784> hot,<WH4841> boil well the flesh,<WH1320> and make thick<WH7543> the broth,<WH4841> and let the bones<WH6106> be burned.<WH2787>

Then set<WH5975> it empty<WH7386> on its coals,<WH1513> that it may be hot,<WH3179> and its brass<WH5178> may burn,<WH2787> and that its filthiness<WH2932> may be molten<WH5413> in it,<WH8432> that its rust<WH2457> may be consumed.<WH8552>
She has wearied<WH3811> herself with toil;<WH8383> yet her great<WH7227> rust<WH2457> doesn't<WH3318> go forth out of her;<WH2457> her rust doesn't<WH784> go forth by fire.

In your filthiness<WH2932> is lewdness:<WH2154> because I have cleansed<WH2891> you and you weren't<WH2891> cleansed, you shall not be cleansed<WH2891> from your filthiness<WH2932> any more,<WH2534> until I have caused my wrath toward you to rest.<WH5117>

I,<WH3068> Yahweh, have spoken<WH1696> it:<WH935> it shall happen, and I will do<WH6213> it:<WH6544> I will not go back, neither will I spare,<WH2347> neither will I repent;<WH5162> according to your ways,<WH1870> and according to your doings,<WH5949> shall they judge<WH8199> you,<WH5002> says the Lord<WH136> Yahweh.<WH3069>
Also the word<WH1697> of Yahweh<WH3068> came to me,<WH559> saying,

Son<WH1121> of man,<WH120> behold,<WH3947> I will take away from you the desire<WH4261> of your eyes<WH5869> with a stroke:<WH4046> yet you shall neither mourn<WH5594> nor weep,<WH1058> neither shall your tears<WH1832> run down.<WH935>

Sigh,<WH602> but not<WH1826> aloud,<WH6213> make no mourning<WH60> for the dead;<WH4191> bind<WH2280> your headdress<WH6287> on you,<WH5275> and put your shoes on<WH7760> your feet,<WH7272> and don't<WH5844> cover your lips,<WH8222> and don't<WH398> eat men<WH582>'s bread.<WH3899>
So I spoke<WH1696> to the people<WH5971> in the morning;<WH1242> and at even<WH6153> my wife<WH802> died;<WH4191> and I did<WH6213> in the morning<WH1242> as I was commanded.<WH6680>
The people<WH5971> said<WH559> to me,<WH5046> Won't you tell us what these things are to us,<WH6213> that you do so?
Then I said<WH559> to them,<WH1697> The word of Yahweh<WH3068> came to me,<WH559> saying,

Speak<WH559> to the house<WH1004> of Israel,<WH3478> Thus says<WH559> the Lord<WH136> Yahweh:<WH3069> Behold,<WH2490> I will profane my sanctuary,<WH4720> the pride<WH1347> of your power,<WH5797> the desire<WH4261> of your eyes,<WH5869> and that which your soul<WH5315> pities;<WH4263> and your sons<WH1121> and your daughters<WH1323> whom you have left<WH5800> behind shall fall<WH5307> by the sword.<WH2719>
You shall do<WH6213> as I have done:<WH6213> you shall not cover<WH5844> your lips,<WH8222> nor eat<WH398> the bread<WH3899> of men.<WH582>

Your tires<WH6287> shall be on your heads,<WH7218> and your shoes<WH5275> on your feet:<WH7272> you shall not mourn<WH5594> nor weep;<WH1058> but you shall pine away<WH4743> in your iniquities,<WH5771> and moan<WH5098> one<WH376> toward another.<WH251>

Thus Ezekiel<WH3168> shall be a sign<WH4159> to you;<WH6213> according to all that he has done, you will do.<WH6213> When this comes,<WH935> then you will know<WH3045> that I am the Lord<WH136> Yahweh.<WH3069>

You,<WH1121> son of man,<WH120> shall it not be in the day<WH3117> when I take<WH3947> from them their strength,<WH4581> the joy<WH4885> of their glory,<WH8597> the desire<WH4261> of their eyes,<WH5869> and that whereupon they set<WH4853> their heart,<WH5315> their sons<WH1121> and their daughters,<WH1323>
that in that day<WH3117> he who escapes<WH6412> shall come<WH935> to you,<WH2045> to cause you to hear it with your ears?<WH241>

In that day<WH3117> your mouth<WH6310> will be opened<WH6605> to him who has escaped,<WH6412> and you shall speak,<WH1696> and be no more mute:<WH481> so you will be a sign<WH4159> to them;<WH3045> and they shall know that I am Yahweh.<WH3068>
